GSD.product_version: versions from v3.0 to before v5.15.95
GSD.description:
net/usb: kalmia: Don't pass act_len in usb_bulk_msg error path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.95 by commit 338f826d3afead6e4df521f7972a4bef04a72efb, it was introduced in version v3.0 by commit d40261236e8e278cb1936cb5e934262971692b10. For more details please see the references link.
